title: 4 Easy Ways to Watch Crunchyroll on Your Samsung Smart TV

steps.title: Set up your Chromecast
steps.content: Set up your Chromecast with your TV. Make sure it's connected properly, and the power adapter is plugged in.

steps.title: Connect your casting device to the same Wi-Fi network.
steps.content: Connect your casting device to the same Wi-Fi network. This is how you'll cast video from your Chromecast-enabled device to the Chromecast on your TV. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Open the Crunchyroll app.
steps.content: Open the Crunchyroll app. If you're using a computer, open the Crunchyroll website on Google Chrome .

steps.title: Tap the "Cast" button.
steps.content: Tap the "Cast" button. This looks like a rectangle with the Wi-Fi symbol in the bottom-left corner. If you don't see it, start playing a show or movie first. If you're using an Android device, go to your lock screen. Tap the output switcher icon at the top-right of the media controls. This looks like a tablet. If you're using a computer, click ⋮ → Save and share → Cast…

steps.title: Select the Cast device.
steps.content: Select the Cast device. Your Samsung TV should be listed under the devices list. Crunchyroll will begin playing immediately. If you don't see your TV, make sure it's connected to the same Wi-Fi network.

steps.title: Connect your AirPlay device and TV on the same network.
steps.content: Connect your AirPlay device and TV on the same network. You can use Apple devices, such as Apple TV, iPhone, iPad, or Mac, to stream your screen onto an AirPlay-compatible Smart TV. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Open a video in the Crunchyroll app.
steps.content: Open a video in the Crunchyroll app. Make sure the app is updated to the latest version.

steps.title: Tap the AirPlay button.
steps.content: Tap the AirPlay button. This looks like a rectangle with a triangle at the bottom.

steps.title: Select your TV.
steps.content: Select your TV. It should appear in the list underneath Speakers & TVs . Your Apple device's screen will be mirrored on your TV. Use your device to control the app. If you don't see your TV, make sure it's on the same Wi-Fi network and you have Bluetooth enabled .

steps.title: Purchase and set up a Streaming Stick.
steps.content: Purchase and set up a Streaming Stick. A Streaming Stick allows you to access streaming services through the internet. Some popular choices include the Amazon Fire TV Stick and Roku Streaming Stick . Currently, Crunchyroll is available as an app on Apple TV, Google TV, Android TV, Roku TV, and Amazon Fire TV. These devices also have upgraded versions that cost a little more, so be sure to choose a device that best matches your needs.

steps.title: Download the Crunchyroll app.
steps.content: Download the Crunchyroll app. Use the device's app store to find and download the app.

steps.title: Launch the Crunchyroll app.
steps.content: Launch the Crunchyroll app. Log in with your account to begin watching.

steps.title: Connect a gaming console to the TV.
steps.content: Connect a gaming console to the TV. If you have a console, you may be able to use it for Crunchyroll. Currently, Crunchyroll is available as an app on PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch, and Xbox. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Download the Crunchyroll app.
steps.content: Download the Crunchyroll app. Visit your console's online store to search for and install the Crunchyroll app.

steps.title: Launch the Crunchyroll app.
steps.content: Launch the Crunchyroll app. Log in with your account to begin watching.
